title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Cayo Perico Motor Wars: New Mode with 2X Rewards
content:
The lush, sprawling grounds of El Rubio’s private island are now a chaotic new battleground in Cayo Perico Motor Wars, a tropical twist on the classic mode that’s dealing out 2X GTA$ and RP for the next two weeks.

GTA+ Members take it further with a staggering 4X GTA$ and RP through August 6. Launch this new Adversary Mode by joining the Cayo Perico Series. Pull up your iFruit and use Quick Join, or head over to the blip on your map in Terminal.
